keyMoments.title: CP9 Arrives at Enies Lobby with Prisoners
keyMoments.description: CP9 successfully transports Robin and Franky to Enies Lobby, their headquarters, completing their mission to capture the targets.
keyMoments.significance: Marks CP9's successful completion of their Water 7 mission and sets up the confrontation at Enies Lobby.

description: CP9 is a secret Cipher Pol organization that operates outside the law, using assassination and espionage tactics. All members are masters of Rokushiki, a superhuman martial arts style, and several possess Devil Fruit powers.

reveals.information: CP9's headquarters is located at Enies Lobby, the Judicial Island
